entry.title: CookTime accounts
entry.content:
We have finished implementing accounts on CookTime. Accounts will allow for some exciting new features like:

  1. Favorite recipes
  2. Private recipes
  3. Ratings
  4. Comments
  5. Recipe lists
  6. Personal shopping lists ✅

And many more! To create an account, navigate to the Sign In page and fill in the form.
entry.summary: We have finished implementing accounts on CookTime. Accounts will allow for some exciting new features like: Favorite recipes Private recipes Ratings Comments Recipe lists Personal shopping lists ✅

entry.title: Welcome to CookTime!
entry.content: We will use this blog to write about new features added to CookTime!
entry.summary: We will use this blog to write about new features added to CookTime!
